title: "Man accused in Washtenaw County homicide claims he acted in self defense"
excerpt: "WASHTENAW COUNTY, MI -- A suspect in a Washtenaw County homicide case is claiming he acted in self-defense, according to court proceedings.. Todd Perkins, the attorney for homicide suspect Martez Robinson, argued in front of Judge Cedric Simpson on Thursday, July 20, that his client should be given bond, despite his charges."
